Bootstrap CSS Workflow

Use this workflow to build customized Bootstrap distributions (including CSS, js, etc...)

  1. create your mock folder (e.g. pantherCartridge) under the dist folder
  2. change values at bootstrap\less\variables.less files
    • look for variables such as @brand-primary or the like
  3. navigate to bower_components folder
  4. issue gunt dist at the command line (@see a probable output below) 

    c:\Users\marco.silva\git\mockupSandbox\bower_components\bootstrap>grunt dist

  5. copy the generated css, fonts, js folders to your own mock folder
  6. try to keep images and icons only at img folder
  7. create a json folder for mimicking JSON outputs
  8. create a local css file for localized CSS (e.g. css/pantherCartrige.css)
  9. create a local js file for localized scripts (e.g. js/pantherCartrige.js)
